Package components

Class Transactions

java.lang.Object
components.Transactions
public class Transactions
extends java.lang.Object
The Transactions class contains all methods needed for transactions.It establishes a connection with the database through DBConnection class.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Transactions.type
    The type enum contains all the types of transactions(Withdrawal,Deposit, and Transfer).

  • Method Details

    • getBalance

      public static double getBalance​(int accountNum)
      Retrieves the user's balance from the account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNum - the user's account number.
      Returns:
      the double value of the user's balance.

    • setBalance

      public static void setBalance​(int accountNum, double balance)
      Changes the user's balance to the new passed value.
      Parameters:
      accountNum - the user's account number.
      balance - the new user's balance.

    • recordTransaction

      public static void recordTransaction​(int transcactionID, int accountNum, int toAccountNum, java.lang.String type, double amount, java.sql.Date date, java.sql.Time time)
      Inserts the transaction details such as account number, type, date, and time in the database.
      Parameters:
      transcactionID - the transaction ID.
      accountNum - the integer value of the account number performed the transaction.
      toAccountNum - the integer value of the account number which the transaction is performed on.
      type - the string value of the transaction type.
      amount - the double of money.
      date - the Date value of the transaction date.
      time - the Time value of the transaction time.

    • getName

      public static java.lang.String getName​(int accountNum)
      Retrieves the user's name according to the passed account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNum - the user's account number.
      Returns:
      the string value of the user's name.

      public static int getNumOfTransactions​(int accountNum)
      Retrieves the number of transactions done by a user.
      Parameters:
      accountNum - the user's account number.
      Returns:
      the integer value of the number of transactions.

    • getAllTransactions

      public static java.sql.ResultSet getAllTransactions​(int accountNum)
      Retrieves all the transactions and their details done by a user.
      Parameters:
      accountNum - the user's account number.
      Returns:
      a ResultSet that contains all detailed transactions.

    • resultSetToTableModel

      public static javax.swing.table.TableModel resultSetToTableModel​(java.sql.ResultSet result)
      Converts a ResultSet object to a TableModel.
      Parameters:
      result - a ResultSet object.
      Returns:
      a TableModel object that contains the ResultSet data.

    • addBeneficiary

      public static void addBeneficiary​(int accountNum, java.lang.String name, int beneficiaryAccountNum, java.lang.String beneficiaryName)
      Adds a beneficiary to a user's account.
      Parameters:
      accountNum - the user's account number.
      name - the user's name.
      beneficiaryAccountNum - the beneficiary's account number.
      beneficiaryName - the beneficiary's name.

    • getAllBeneficiaries

      public static java.sql.ResultSet getAllBeneficiaries​(int accountNum)
      Retrieves all the user's beneficiaries and their account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNum - the user's account number.
      Returns:
      a ResultSet that contains all beneficiaries and their account number.

    • isBeneficiary

      public static boolean isBeneficiary​(int accountNum, int beneficiaryAccountNum)
      Checks if the beneficiary is added to a user's beneficiaries list.
      Parameters:
      accountNum - the user's account number.
      beneficiaryAccountNum - the beneficiary's account number.
      Returns:
      true if the beneficiary's account number is added to the user's beneficiaries; false otherwise.
